value:
I live to fight. So your goal of seeking
peace is...problematic...for me.

Eirika... Ephraim... These two, they
are my prey. And only the finest prey
will sate my bloodlust.

Are you tired? Then you must rest.
Weakness saps prey of its...finer
qualities.

I've no use for bloodless minnows. I
hunger for prey that will sate my
bloodlust...

Training? I don't play pretend. The
only way to learn to kill is to kill.

So you're the one I was sent by
$Nf to greet.$k$pYou make for delicious-looking prey,
$Nu.

I am Valter, the Moonstone, one of
Grado's six generals. Do you seek to
sate my hunger? Many have...

A senile old fool once called me a
beast—a wretched beast that lives
only to kill and take what it can.$k$pI will kill that man one day. Still, he is
correct, of course. I am a beast, with
a mouth full of fangs.$k$pI do take what I want. I'll take
whatever I desire. From anyone.$k$pKnowing this, you have made use of
me. And you have granted me much
power...$k$pI cannot understand your actions.$k$pDo you intend to control me? Or do
you long for me to be your master?$k$pEither way, you have become my
finest prey. I will not permit another to
sate their bloodlust on you...$k$pJust me.
I am Valter, the Moonstone, one of Grado's six generals.
Hm? You desire to touch me?
Never think that I am yours. If you displease me, you'll regret it.
Show me. Show me. Grovel like a dog.
You are mine now. Entertain me! More!
